extension.news: [B][COLOR red]Update - v6.3.3 - Nov. 08, 2021[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Scraping process has been modified to elliminate some overhead to speed up completion time.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Each provider/scraper has a priority value that determines the order the providers/scrapers run at. Previousely this was hardcoded to always be used. You can now enable/disable if priorty ordering is used. In a case where one may be using pre-emptive termination this may best be suited on while without pre-emptive termination it yields little benefit and can be slightly faster with it off.[/I] [COLOR yellow]--[/COLOR][I] Providers in Source Select can now be reverse sorted low to high in settings.[/I]
